bug.author: erfannoury
bug.description:
In the implementation, multiplication with another is also implemented, whereas in the library, it is not possible to multiply two s (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/n1analytics/python-paillier/blob/master/phe/paillier.py#L746-L748>ref.</denchmark-link> ).
PySyft/syft/he/Paillier.py
Line 97 in 16dae46
out.data = self.data * y.data
